item.title: Wimbledon 2015: Days 1 and 2
item.trailText: Guardian photographers Tom Jenkins and Graeme Robertson are down in SW19 to bring you a selection of their best images from the opening two days
item.standFirst: Guardian photographers Tom Jenkins and Graeme Robertson are down in SW19 to bring you a selection of their best images from the opening two days

displayImages.cleanCaption: Murray is applauded by the crowd after his victory

displayImages.caption: And then asked for his autograph as he makes his way off court following his victory Photograph: Tom Jenkins

displayImages.caption: Gaël Monfils runs after a ball during his victory over Pablo Carreño Busta on Court 3 Photograph: Tom Jenkins

displayImages.cleanCaption: Gaël Monfils runs after a ball during his victory over Pablo Carreño Busta on Court 3

displayImages.caption: Another victorious Brit on day 2 was Aljaz Bedene who beat Radek Stepanek Photograph: Tom Jenkins
displayImages.altText: Another victorious Brit on day 2 was Aljaz Bedene who beat Radek Stepanek 7-5, 1-6, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4
displayImages.cleanCaption: Another victorious Brit on day 2 was Aljaz Bedene who beat Radek Stepanek
